text:
UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA
CHARLOTTESVILLE
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
August 8, 195b*
Mr. Harold E. Hill, Associate Director,
National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
1l\. Gregory Hall,
Urbana, Ill*
Dear Mr. Hills
I wish to acknowledge receipt of your letter of
the 6th, which I am referring to Mr. Vaughan, Provost of
the University for his consideration.
Sincerely,
